snippet: President Obama is successfully invoking Mitt Romney’s career at Bain Capital to raise doubts about Mr. Romney’s commitment to the middle class, strategists in both parties say.
abstract: Pres Obama is successfully invoking Mitt Romney’s career at Bain Capital to raise questions about his commitment to the middle class, largely by means of a torrent of blistering television advertisements; Romney campaign, flush with an additional $100 million in campaign donations, is preparing to respond with its own fresh volley of ads.

byline.original: By JIM RUTENBERG and JEFF ZELENY

lead_paragraph: President Obama is successfully invoking Mitt Romney’s career at Bain Capital to raise doubts about Mr. Romney’s commitment to the middle class, strategists in both parties say.

headline.main: Bain Attacks Make Inroads for President
headline.print_headline: Bain Attacks Make Inroads For President

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
